prompts.prompt: Get all MCP servers. For each server, look up the names of all assigned security groups and check if the server's secured option is enabled. Show a table with the server name, assigned security group names, and whether the server is secured (true/false).

template.name: list-servers-securitygroups
template.title: List servers and security groups
template.description: Retrieves all MCP servers and displays for each server the assigned security groups and whether secured mode is enabled.

prompts.prompt: Get all MCP servers. For each server, look up the Entra display names of all owners (by user ID). Show a table listing each server and its owner names.

template.name: list-servers-owners
template.title: List servers and owners
template.description: Retrieves all MCP servers and displays the display names of all owners for each server.

prompts.prompt: Find the Entra user ID of user {userDisplayName}. When found, add the user as an owner to MCP server {server}.

template.name: add-server-owner
template.title: Add server owner
template.description: Adds a specific user as an owner to the selected MCP server.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: userDisplayName
arguments.description: The display name of the user to add as an owner

prompts.prompt: Find the Entra user ID of user {userDisplayName}. When found, Remove the user as an owner to MCP server {server}.

template.name: remove-server-owner
template.title: Remove server owner
template.description: Removes a specific user from the list of owners on a MCP server.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: userDisplayName
arguments.description: The display name of the user to remove

prompts.prompt: Find the Entra ID of security group {securityGroupName}. When found, add the security group to server {server}.

template.name: add-security-group
template.title: Add security group
template.description: Adds a security group to the specified MCP server for access control.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: securityGroupName
arguments.description: The name of the security group to add

prompts.prompt: Find the Entra ID of security group {securityGroupName}. When found, remove the security group from server {server}.

template.name: remove-security-group
template.title: Remove security group
template.description: Removes an existing security group from the specified MCP server.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: securityGroupName
arguments.description: The name of the security group to remove

template.name: set-server-secured
template.title: Set server secured mode
template.description: Enables security enforcement on the selected MCP server.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server
